promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary bird electric-type pokemon wearing a lightning-charged crystal headband. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltavias, a a gigantic legendary bird electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Psychic Bolt, Call for Pals. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "electric" or "Voltavias". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, bird-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: Majestic winged titan, Voltavias soars atop peaks, wielding its mind-powered zaps to summon friends. A sight to spark awe and wonder.
